Articles.Content:
I got fraps, and I recorded me launching a KW Rocketry/Deep space mod/Stock R7 replica rocket and deploying a Sputnik replica into orbit. When I got the footage, I didn't know how to Edit out some parts with Sony Vegas, and when I tried uploading the video itself to youtube, it says it will take over 1,000 minutes to upload over 10 minutes of Gameplay.

So I am asking for your help, PLEASE help me because I would LOVE to start my own KSP series, with already knowing how to edit videos and how to make them upload faster than 1,000 minutes.
Moved to The Junkyard, as this doesn't really belong in Support.

Your video is likely several gigs in size. Get a program like Handbrake to compress it down to a reasonable level. A 20 minute video I did using Fraps was 11GB and Handbrake compressed it down to 140MB.
